Articles.Content: Hi I am Calnorc Kerman, I am joining the Kerbal Space Program. I still and Needing the game if anyone would willing give me a copy that would be amazing

Hi Calnorc, welcome to the community

Until you can get your own copy there is the KSP Demo, I'm not sure you'll find someone who will buy KSP for a total stranger, but it might happen

Good luck getting the game, I hope we'll see you flying rockets soon.
I'de love to give you a copy but I would be banned Try the demo and I hope you can get the game soon, It is worth it.
I have a version my friend gave me Its 0.16 But I would like to get it father in the new version because of the new planets. I have a plane if you want to see pics of it

Calnorc, if your friend gave you KSP, then that is technically piracy, you really should play the demo until you can afford the game, you won't be getting a free copy from here, and now we know you are playing without paying, no one here will want to buy the game for you.
I will switch to the demo then Thanks for letting me know.

I know the demo is limited Calnorc, but it is for the best.

You might want to take a look at the forum rules while you are here.

Time to save your pennies now Calnorc
Thank you for all the help. I didnt know it was piracy I am very sorry
When you can get some pennies together, you'll want to visit this page, and you can find the download instructions here

Why would you been banned?

Banned would have been the least of their problems mate

Piracy is illegal practically everywhere. Just save up your money to buy KSP, it is worth it!

Anyways, illegal actions aside, WELCOME ABOARD! lol
Welcome aboard, buying the game helps the dev team eat and keep building the game so save up! -DR
